subject: RXIL-TReDS - Intimation of Registration - {{memberName}}
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,


One of the customers of your Bank as per details given below, has registered on Trade Receivables Discounting System (TReDS) platform of Receivables Exchange of India Limited (RXIL) as a Buyer, to facilitate payment to its MSME Vendors.
Name of the Participant{{memberName}}
Constitution{{constitution}}
Designated Banker on TReDS for Settlement{{bankName}}

RXIL shall inform you through mails, as and when the above participant makes any transaction on the TReDS platform.
Meanwhile, this is for your information and necessary action.
